title: Cropcoin Trading 19.1% Higher  Over Last Week (CROP)
content: Cropcoin (CURRENCY:CROP) traded 33% higher against the US dollar during the 24 hour period ending at 17:00 PM ET on June 2nd. In the last seven days, Cropcoin has traded up 19.1% against the US dollar. Cropcoin has a total market cap of $0.00 and approximately $12,175.00 worth of Cropcoin was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. One Cropcoin coin can now be purchased for $0.0295 or 0.00000387 BTC on cryptocurrency exchanges including CoinExchange and CryptoBridge.    Here is how other cryptocurrencies have performed in the last 24 hours:    Ripple (XRP) traded 4.3% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008407 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded up 4.2% against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003914 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded 0.9% higher against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024749 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded up 5.3% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0610 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded 3.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $56.56 or 0.00740923 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded 1.1% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012957 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded up 9.5% against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048676 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded 4.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $14.71 or 0.00192636 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded 10.4% higher against the dollar and now trades at $7.77 or 0.00101838 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded 7.7% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001554 BTC.   About Cropcoin     Cropcoin is a coin. Cropcoin’s total supply is 19,448,910 coins. The official website for Cropcoin is www.cropcoin.net . Cropcoin’s official Twitter account is @IamCropcoin .  Cropcoin Coin Trading    Cropcoin can be traded on the following cryptocurrency exchanges: CoinExchange and CryptoBridge. It is usually not possible to purchase alternative cryptocurrencies such as Cropcoin directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to acquire Cropcoin should first purchase Ethereum or Bitcoin using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as GDAX, Changelly or Coinbase . Investors can then use their newly-acquired Ethereum or Bitcoin to purchase Cropcoin using one of the exchanges listed above.
